resources:
TecHunt
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer
Settings
Here are some of the rules fellas,

 1. Teams must travel on foot.

 2. Teams must stay together.

 3. Teams are not allowed to use Internet facilities for searching answers.

 4. Turn on the internet facilities.

 5. Do not move tamper with destroy otherwise alter answers clue location.

 6. Time Limit is 1 hour.

 7. Do not guess, Wrong Answer will result in a penalty of loosing 1 min from the available time counter.

 8. Do not close the application in between the game.


• This event is divided into multiple rounds.

 • Each round has two questions,
 1. MCQ based Technical Question
 2. Location Question.

 • Only on the correct answer to the technical question, the location question for the round will appear.

 • For the location question, the team has to identify the location from the clues given in the question.

 • An answer to this question will be a four digit code which will be present at the location subtly defined in the question.

 • After giving the correct solution of given questions and solving series of clues, teams will move to next round.


OPTIMISTS is the student society of Association of Department of Computer Applications in JSS Academy of Technical Education, Noida.
It supports students to cope with rapidly changing trends and technologies in IT world.
It provides students a platform to work as a team for learning, managing, training, organizing, enjoying and studying.

This event is coordinated by the students of MCA Department.

 Team Members: 

 1. Hemant Makhija (Technical Head)
 2. Anand Sachan (Co-ordinator)
 3. Kulbeer Chopra (Co-ordinator)
 4. Shivam Kapoor (Sub Co-ordinator)
 5. Prateek Upadhyay (Sub Co-ordinator)
 6. Aishwarya Singh (Sub Co-ordinator)
 7. Zeeshan Chaudhary (Sub Co-ordinator)

Team 1 Question
23, 25, 31, 34, 37, 41
Find the odd one.
41 34 37 23
#include<stdio.h>
 int main(){
 int a, b = 35;
 a = \-b\-\-;
 printf("a = %d, b = %d", a, b);
 return 0; }

-35,35 35,34 -34,34 -35,34
If, Ross can finish his summer holiday homework in 15 days and Monica can finish her summer holiday homework in 20 days. If they work on it together for 4 days, then the fraction of the holiday work that is left is
0.53 0.47 0.25 0.10
If, TOTAL is coded as 19172. Then TIP will be coded as?
127 179 125 158
Which term may be used interchangeably with "username?"
Password Passphrase Domain name Handle
Location Question
I wave all day but never tire,
at the end of day I retire. What I am?
What’s round and orange with strips all around?
In many driveways they bounce up and down.
An offline source to get updated with worlds whereabouts.
I have a numbering system.
Caution is needed going my way.
People stare and can’t get enough,
Paper and invites hang around,
Up on the wall I can be found.
********************************************************************
Team 2 Question
33, 35, 41, 44, 47, 51
Find the odd one.
51 44 47 33
#include<stdio.h>
 int main(){
 int a, b = 45;
 a = \-b\-\-;
 printf("a = %d, b = %d", a, b);
 return 0;}

-45,45 -45,44 45,44 -44,44
If, Joey can finish his summer holiday homework in 15 days and Phoebe can finish his summer holiday homework in 20 days. If they work on it together for 4 days, then the fraction of the holiday work that is left is
0.47 0.25 0.10 0.53
If, JSSATE is coded as 199172. Then SIR will be coded as?
917 950 921 912
What is the aspect ratio of a 4K display?
3:2 4:3 8:5 16:9
Location Question
I am crowded at the month’s beginning.
I remain in 24*7 security whole my life.
A pile of words a million stories but cannot tell them.
Steve Jobs visited this place every Sunday in his early life.
There’s a place nearby you’ll want to meet,
 A portal place where people greet.
To solve the hunt,
you must get into the room wired to the net,
crammed with tech and full of code,
the clue is hidden in this above code.
********************************************************************

Location Question
A society which believes in positive mind-set. A place to get your hunger cured. I wave all day but never tire,
at the end of day I retire.
What I am? I have a numbering system.
Caution is needed going my way. I am crowded at the month’s beginning.
I remain in 24*7 security whole my life.
